description:
A single point to learn Cisco Security Technologies from CCNA Security to CCNP Security and much more..

This single course include CCNA Security & CCNP Security Five Exams

  • CCNP Security 300-206 SENSS (Implementing Cisco Edge Network Security Solutions)
  • CCNP Security 300-209 SIMOS (Implementing Cisco Secure Mobility Solutions)
  • CCNP Security 300-208 SISAS (Implementing Cisco Secure Access Solutions)
  • CCNP Security 300-207 SITCS (Implementing Cisco Threat Control Solutions) 
  • CCNA Security 210-260 IINSv3 (Implementing Cisco Network Security)

CCNP Security 300-206 SENSS Module Contents in brief: (100 Plus Videos)

  • Firewall Introduction
  • Implementation of Routing on Cisco ASA
  • Implementation of NAT & Access-list on Cisco ASA
  • Implementation of Virtual Private Network on Cisco ASA
  • Implementation of Advance Firewall Features of Cisco ASA
  • Updated Contents of Cisco ASA OS 9.x Features

CCNP Security 300-209 SIMOS Module Contents in brief: (100 Plus Videos)

  • Implementation of Site-Site VPN
  • Implementation of Remote Access VPN
  • Implementation of Secure Socket Layer VPN
  • Implementation of Dynamic Multipoint VPN
  • Implementation of Group Encrypted Transport VPN
  • Implementation of Flex VPN
  • Implementation of VPN With Microsoft Server 2016

CCNP Security 300-208 SISAS Module Contents in brief: (Update in Progress)

  • Microsoft Server 2008 Installation on VMware Workstation
  • Active Directory Installation on Microsoft Server 2008
  • Certificate Authority Installation on Microsoft Server 2008
  • Cisco ISE Installation on VMware Workstation
  • Cisco ISE and AD Snapshot in VMware
  • Cisco ISE Backup
  • Cisco ISE Restore
  • Cisco ISE Patch Installation
  • Cisco ISE Patch Rollback
  • Cisco ISE Up-gradation
  • Cisco ISE Lab Initial Configuration

CCNP Security 300-207 SITCS (Coming Soon)

CCNA Security 210-260 IINSv3 (Coming Soon)

Hi Friends, 

You can start from lesson 1 to  lesson last. At the end, you will realize  that I know CCNA Security and CCNP Security as well as CCIE Security concepts, and one more thing I am doing work on remaining concepts. It will take some time till then complete these lesson before you finish I will update another.

Contents and Overview 

Including 72+ hours Videos Training and 264 lectures. All 264 lectures and Book are Downloadable.

This course covers necessary Cisco CCNP Security Training and Security Technologies concepts in simple words.

Upon completion students will be able to configure implement & T-shoot the Cisco ASA/PIX firewall & security technologies like Routing, NAT, CTP, IPv6, Object-Group, VPN and Advance Firewall Features like Transparent Firewall, Security Context, Failover, Clustering, Cisco IOS VPNs like Site-Site, Remote Access, SSL, DMVPN, GETVPN, Flex VPN, Cisco ISE Installtion, deployment in real environment & lab environment.

What are the requirements?

  • A familiarity of Routing on Cisco Routers and Firewall
  • A familiarity of Switching on Cisco Switches
  • Have GNS3 installed and functioning
  • Have Oracle Virtual Box & Microsoft Operating systems

What is the target audience?

Cisco CCNP Security certification candidates or anyone interested in learning networking basics. As well as IT professionals and managers who want to understand and learn this hot new security technology.
title: CCNA Security and CCNP Security 2016 All-in-one With Baldev
